name: Standard
description: Standard scheme where each interval is about twice the previous one.

name: Compact
description: Smaller version of the standard scheme with larger intervals at the beginning to increase time efficiency. Final interval lengths are the same to ensure long-term memorization.

name: Very compact
description: Smaller version of the compact scheme with even larger intervals at the beginning to increase time efficiency. Final interval lengths are the same to ensure long-term memorization.

name: Standard Extended
description: Standard scheme with an additional 8 months interval. Useful for a rather small vocabulary with many rare/specialized terms that are hard to memorize.
